meanings.definition: The quality of being inexpensive or low in price.
meanings.sent1: The cheapnesses of the products attracted many budget-conscious shoppers.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the cheapnesses of this store; I can buy so much with my limited budget.
meanings.sent3: The cheapnesses of the items made me wonder if they were secretly made of cardboard.
meanings.sent4: The cheapnesses of the materials used in the construction were evident when the building collapsed.
meanings.sent5: The cheapnesses of the fabrics made the clothes feel rough and uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: The state of being of poor quality or low value.
meanings.sent1: The cheapnesses of the furniture were evident in the wobbly legs and peeling paint.
meanings.sent2: I was disappointed by the cheapnesses of the souvenirs I bought on vacation.
meanings.sent3: The cheapnesses of the toys became apparent when they broke after just a few minutes of play.
meanings.sent4: The cheapnesses of the jewelry made it tarnish quickly and lose its shine.
meanings.sent5: The cheapnesses of the artwork were revealed when the colors faded within a few months.
